testcase.name: CreatePost

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"Job Location":"NAGHA","Job Id":"4567","Job Company Name":"Computer Enterprises, Inc.","Job Posted time":"30 min","Job Description":"This Is Important for every one","Job Title":"SDET","Job Type":"COntract"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/joson", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
